PSTN
PSTN Access Code
*00 Key pattern to use the PSTN line.
Route Call to PSTN 1
Outbound calls will be routed to PSTN port when dialed digits match.

Outbound calls will be routed to PSTN port when dialed digits match.

Outbound calls will be routed to PSTN port when dialed digits match.

Route Call to PSTN 1

Forward to PSTN

Forward to VoIP
